name: William Latimer Small LANDES, III, and National Central Bank, Co-Trustees Under the Will of William Latimer Small Landes, Appellees, v. Reynold B. SMITH and Josephine L. Smith, Appellants

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: William Latimer Small LANDES, III, and National Central Bank, Co-Trustees Under the Will of William Latimer Small Landes, Appellees, v. Reynold B. SMITH and Josephine L. Smith, Appellants.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Allen H. Smith, York, for appellants.
LeRoy E. Euvrard, Jr., York, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
373 A.2d 1112
William Latimer Small LANDES, III, and National Central Bank, Co-Trustees Under the Will of William Latimer Small Landes, Appellees, v. Reynold B. SMITH and Josephine L. Smith, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued June 25, 1975.
Decided June 3, 1977.
Allen H. Smith, York, for appellants.
LeRoy E. Euvrard, Jr., York, for appellees.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
